broken.title: No Effect
broken.text: This item cannot be broken.

broken.title: Broken!
broken.text: The Spear snaps and cannot be used until you spend [Time] [Time] during the Rest Phase to repair it.

basic.name: Rough Spear
basic.text: The most basic of sticks, with a roughly cast head.

upgraded.name: Spear
upgraded.text: An improved head and binding makes this spear more deadly.

broken.title: Broken!
broken.text: The Staff snaps and cannot be used until you spend [Time] [Time] during the Rest Phase to repair it.

basic.name: Rough Staff
basic.text: A trimmed, thick, tree branch, cut to use as a makeshift weapon.

upgraded.name: Staff
upgraded.text: A reinforced version of the rough staff, stronger and lighter.

broken.title: String Snapped!
broken.text: The Bow's string snaps, and you cannot use it until you spend [Time] during the Rest Phase to repair it.

basic.name: Rough Bow
basic.text: A roughly hewn bow, with a simple bow string.

upgraded.name: Bow
upgraded.text: Cut from a yew tree, it is stronger and more accurate.

broken.title: Broken!
broken.text: The head of the axe comes away and it cannot be used until you spend [Time] [Time] during the Rest Phase to repair it.

basic.name: Worn Axe
basic.text: An old felling axe, work and tarnished.

upgraded.name: Axe
upgraded.text: A sharpened blade and reinforced head make this a better weapon.

broken.title: Broken!
broken.text: The bill at the end has come away. The Weapon cannot be used until you spend [Time] [Time] during the Rest Phase to repair it.

basic.name: Crude Polearm
basic.text: A pole, with a farmer's bill strapped to one end.

upgraded.name: Bill
upgraded.text: A pole that has had a hooked blade screwed onto it.

broken.title: Shattered!
broken.text: Reduce Ammo by 1. You may spend [Time] during the Rest Phase to Restore each lost Ammo up to the maximum for the Weapon.

basic.name: Hunting Javelin
basic.text: A shaft with a thin metal point designed for hunting animals.

upgraded.name: War Javelin
upgraded.text: Sturdier than its hunting cousin, it is heavier and better weighted.

broken.title: No Effect
broken.text: This Weapon is a solid piece of wood, almost impossible to break.

basic.name: Club
basic.text: A solid piece of wood, simple and effective, with a handle.

upgraded.name: Shillelagh
upgraded.text: A reinforced solid piece of wood, with a sturdy handle.

broken.title: Broken!
broken.text: The Spear snaps and cannot be used until you spend [Time] [Time] during the Rest Phase to repair it.

basic.name: Rough Spear
basic.text: The most basic of sticks, with a roughly cast head.

upgraded.name: Spear
upgraded.text: An improved head and binding makes this spear more deadly.

broken.title: Broken!
broken.text: The Staff snaps and cannot be used until you spend [Time] [Time] during the Rest Phase to repair it.

basic.name: Rough Staff
basic.text: A trimmed, thick, tree branch, cut to use as a makeshift weapon.

upgraded.name: Staff
upgraded.text: A reinforced version of the rough staff, stronger and lighter.

broken.title: String Snapped!
broken.text: The Bow's string snaps, and you cannot use it until you spend [Time] during the Rest Phase to repair it.

basic.name: Rough Bow
basic.text: A roughly hewn bow, with a simple bow string.

upgraded.name: Bow
upgraded.text: Cut from a yew tree, it is stronger and more accurate.

broken.title: Broken!
broken.text: The head of the axe comes away and it cannot be used until you spend [Time] [Time] during the Rest Phase to repair it.

basic.name: Worn Axe
basic.text: An old felling axe, work and tarnished.

upgraded.name: Axe
upgraded.text: A sharpened blade and reinforced head make this a better weapon.

abilities.name: Public Speaker
abilities.text: Gain +1 to your Will for your current Test, or +2 if it is a Lead (Will) Test.

abilities.name: Resolute
abilities.text: Reroll any Will Test, ignoring Weakness for that reroll.

abilities.name: Rouse Friends
abilities.text: Grant Advantage to another Hero for their current attack.

abilities.name: Guidance
abilities.text: Gain Mastery for your current Test.

abilities.name: Shield of Faith
abilities.text: Use as a Ranged Attack in Combat. Add a number of Ammo tokens to the card equal to your [Faith]. You may discard a token to remove Disadvantage when it is gained by any Hero. Discard all tokens at the end of Combat.

abilities.name: Lend Aid
abilities.text: When Camping during the Rest Phase you may Exhaust this Talent to Heal another Hero for [Health].

abilities.name: Agile
abilities.text: Gain +1 to your Grace for your current Test, or +2 if it is a Leap (Grace) Test.

abilities.name: Distraction
abilities.text: Use as a Melee Attack. Remove Disadvantage and Grant Advantage to the next Hero. Test Move (Grace) vs 8 and take [Damage] on failure.

abilities.name: Quiet Approach
abilities.text: Gain Mastery on a Surprise Test.

abilities.name: Verbose
abilities.text: Gain +1 to your Charm for your current test, or +2 if it is a Bluff (Charm) Test.

abilities.name: Convincing
abilities.text: For each [Negotiation] you have, gain +1 on a Test where you have Mastery.

abilities.name: Restart Discussion
abilities.text: Use after a failed roll during and Encounter to reroll the Test again and take the new result.

abilities.name: Fast Talker
abilities.text: Gain +1 to your Charm for your current Test, or +2 if it is a Persuade (Charm) Test.

abilities.name: Looting
abilities.text: When resolving a Careful Search or Quick Search you may draw 1 extra card.

abilities.name: Dirty Fighter
abilities.text: Turn a [TradeBlows] into a [Strike] if you had Advantage on your attack.

abilities.name: Inventive
abilities.text: Discard a Loot item to grant +1 to your current Test.

abilities.name: Resourceful
abilities.text: Use as a Ranged Attack in Combat. Discard a Loot item to gain a number of Ammo counters on this card equal to the number of [Engineering] that the Hero has. You may discard a token to grant Advantage to any Hero. Discard all tokens at the end of Combat.

abilities.name: Jury-Rig
abilities.text: During the Rest Phase discard any two Loot items to take a Loot item from the Adventure discard pile or fix a broken Kit or Weapon during the Rest Phase.

abilities.name: Test Strength
abilities.text: Gain +1 to your Handle for your current Test, or +2 if it is a Probe (Handle) Test.

abilities.name: Loot for Spares
abilities.text: Exhaust after successfully Resolving any Obstacle or Barrier that has [Devices], [Construction] or [Engineering] to complete a Careful Search immediately by spending 1 [Time].

abilities.name: Re-Rig
abilities.text: Gain +2 to your current Test versus a Trap or a Booby Trap.

abilities.name: Fungal Feast
abilities.text: Exhaust this talent to create a [CampSite] in this location until the end of this turn.

abilities.name: Fungal Spores
abilities.text:
Use as a Ranged Attack. Gain +1 to the roll for each [Herbology] you have.
[Strike] 14+ [PushedBack] 10+, 8+ [Miss], [Fail] <=7, inflicts [Damage].

abilities.name: Antidote
abilities.text: Remove the [Poison] Condition from a number of Heroes equal to the number of [Herbology] you have. This Ability is not affected by the [Poison] Condition.

abilities.name: Scholar
abilities.text: Gain +1 to your Reason for your current Test, or +2 if it is an Identify (Reason) Test.

abilities.name: Lend Learning
abilities.text: Give another Hero +1 to their current Test for any non-combat Test.

abilities.name: Deep Recall
abilities.text: Gain Mastery on your current non-combat Test.

abilities.name: Quick Snack
abilities.text: You may Heal any Hero for [Damage]

abilities.name: Exterminator
abilities.text: Gain +2 on any Test against a card that has the [Animal] modifier, or to any Event that requires [Animal].

abilities.name: Follow Tracks
abilities.text: Gain +2 to the current Scouting Test from this location

abilities.name: Waterborn
abilities.text: Gain +1 to your Brawn for your current Test, or +2 if it is a Swim (Brawn) Test.

abilities.name: Damp Skin
abilities.text: You may ignore the [Fire] condition for this Combat. Discard all fire tokens currently on the Hero.

abilities.name: Free Flowing
abilities.text: Gain Mastery for your current Test on a card with [Flood].

abilities.name: Plan Ahead
abilities.text: When you must spend [Time], reduce [Time] spent by 1, to a minimum of 1.

abilities.name: Preparation
abilities.text: After resolving a Barrier, you may Exhaust this talent to change your Readiness from [Careless] to [Bold].

abilities.name: Bright Travel
abilities.text: Gain Mastery on your current Scouting Test when using a Bright Exit.

abilities.name: Rope Walker
abilities.text: Gain +1 to your Grace for your current Test, or +2 if it is a Balance (Grace) Test.

abilities.name: Tumbling
abilities.text: Turn any Climb (Brawn) Test into a Leap (Grace) Test.

abilities.name: Side Step
abilities.text: Turn a [TradeBlows] result into a [PushBack] result.

abilities.name: Finder of Shiny Rocks
abilities.text: Gain the Loot modifier bonus to an Encounter without discarding an item of Loot.

abilities.name: Underground Ken
abilities.text: Gain +1 to your current Test on a Curiosity card for each [Subterranean] you have.

abilities.name: Dark Sight
abilities.text: Remove Disadvantage from the next attack.

abilities.name: Find a Way Through
abilities.text: Reroll 1 die on any Test against a Barrier.

abilities.name: Scout Ahead
abilities.text: Look at the top card of the Adventure deck, and then return it to the top of the deck.

abilities.name: Buzzing Gnat
abilities.text: Gain Advantage for your Hero's next attack.

abilities.name: Oxlike
abilities.text: Gain +1 to your Brawn for your current Test, or +2 if it is a Brute (Brawn) Test.

abilities.name: Unstoppable
abilities.text: Reduce all [Damage] from one source to one.

abilities.name: Brawler
abilities.text: Change a [PushedBack] result into a [Advance] or [TradeBlows] result.

abilities.name: Read Arcana
abilities.text: Gain +1 to your Reason for your current Test, or +2 if it is a Solve (Reason) Test.

abilities.name: Flint Flash
abilities.text: Use as a Ranged Attack. The next X attacks by the Party in this Combat gain Advantage, where X is half the number of [Arcana] you have, rounded up.

abilities.name: Candle Call
abilities.text: Create [Light] until the end of the Turn.

abilities.name: One Hand
abilities.text: Add +1 to Handlee to any Hero's current Teast.

abilities.name: Many Fists
abilities.text: Use as a Ranged Attack. Gain +1 to the roll for each [Arcana] you have. ([Strike] 15+, [PushedBack] 12+, [Miss] 8+, [Damage] <8, inflicts [Damage].

abilities.name: Two Hands
abilities.text: Gain +3 on any Hero's Handle for their current Test.

abilities.name: Manipulative
abilities.text: Gain +1 to your Charm for yout current Test, or +2 if it is an Intrigue (Charm) Test.

abilities.name: Influence
abilities.text: Gain _1 to your current Test in an Encounter for each [Etiquette] you have.

abilities.name: Fencing
abilities.text: Increase the Damage of a [Strike] or [Critical] by 1.

abilities.name: Assert
abilities.text: Another Hero gains Advantage for their next attacj this Combat.

abilities.name: Inspire
abilities.text: Another Hero may Restore one Exhausted Talent. May be used in Combat.

abilities.name: Retreat
abilities.text: Play as your Ranged Attack. The current Combat ends immediately, and the Party Retreats to the previous Location at no Time cost.

abilities.name: Haggler
abilities.text: Gain +1 to your Will for your current Test, or +2 if it is a Coerce (Will) Test.

abilities.name: Create Distraction
abilities.text: Use as a Ranged Attack. All Foe Ranged Attacks gain Disadvantage this Round.

abilities.name: Quick Talker
abilities.text: Use during an Encounter to reroll the Test.

abilities.name: Organise
abilities.text: Gain +1 to all Heroes for your current Party Test.

abilities.name: Lead by Example
abilities.text: Reroll your current Lead (Will) or Grit (Will) Test.

abilities.name: Motivate
abilities.text: Another Hero may reroll 1 die on their current Test. This cannot be used for scouting Tests.

abilities.name: Climber
abilities.text: Gain +1 to your Brawn for the current Test, or +2 if it is a Climb (Brawn) Test

abilities.name: Listen To The Rock
abilities.text: If the Party Sneaks then gain an additional +1 for each [undergound] to any Surprise Teat this Turn.

abilities.name: Cave Brother
abilities.text: Gain +2 to your current Test on any Event that requires [Gas] or [Flood] or grant +2 for all Heroes on a Party Test on any Event that requires [Gas] or [Flood]

abilities.name: Nimble
abilities.text: Gain +1 to your Grace for your current Test, or _2 if it is a Move (Grace) Test.

abilities.name: Subterranean Scavenger
abilities.text: After Resolving any card with [Subterranean], you may conduct a Careful Search in this Location at no Time cost.

abilities.name: Underground Escape
abilities.text: The current Combat ends at the end of this Combat round, and the Party Retreats to the previous Location at no Time cost.

abilities.name: Fix
abilities.text: Gain +1 to your Handle for yout current Test, or +2 if it is a Mend (Handle) Test.

abilities.name: Solid Construction
abilities.text: Double the bonus from one Loot item taht you use in a Test.

abilities.name: Bladesinger
abilities.text: Turn a [Strike] into a [Critical]

abilities.name: Face the Fire
abilities.text: Gain +1 to your Reason for your current Test, or +2 if it is a Grit (Will) Test.

abilities.name: Reforge
abilities.text: Use during the Rest Phase. Discard any two Loot items to take a Loot item from the discard pile or fix a broken Kit or Weapon.

abilities.name: Steady Hand
abilities.text: Ignore Disadvantage for your next attack in this Combat.

abilities.name: Party Worker
abilities.text: If you roll a Success at a Party Basic Test you may upgrade your result to a Critical Success.

abilities.name: Common Sense
abilities.text: If you fail a Test where you have Mastery, then reroll the Test with Mastery.

abilities.name: Committed
abilities.text: Reroll one of your Basic Tests or Party Basic Tests.

abilities.name: Cattle Catcher
abilities.text: Gain +1 to your Handle for your current Test, or +2 if it is a Throw (Handle) Test.

abilities.name: Calm the Herd
abilities.text: Reroll one of the dice on your current Test.

abilities.name: Spot Traces
abilities.text: You may reroll the Surprise Test for the Party.

abilities.name: Keen Eyed
abilities.text: Gain +1 to your Reason for your current Test, or +2 if it is a Spot (Reason) Test.

abilities.name: Peer into the Future
abilities.text: Must be used in the Scouting Phase before the Scouting Test. You gain +2 to your Scouting and Surprise Tests for the rest of this Turn.

abilities.name: Fey Brethren
abilities.text: You may reroll a Test against a card that has [Fey].

abilities.name: Find Flaw
abilities.text: Gain +1 for each [Construction] you have for your current Test versus a Barrier.

abilities.name: Reuse Parts
abilities.text: After successfully resolving any Obstacle or Barrier that has [Devices], [Construction] or [Engineering] speciality, perform a Careful Search immediately.

abilities.name: Strong Arm
abilities.text: Change your [PushedBack] result into an [Advance] result.

abilities.name: Plant Lore
abilities.text: Gain +2 to your current non-combat Test in a location that has [Fungi].

abilities.name: Anti-venom
abilities.text: You may remove the [Poison] condition from all Heroes in the Party. This may not be used in Combat. This Ability is not affected by the [Poison] Condition.

abilities.name: Herbal Remedy
abilities.text: Heal any Hero for [Damage]. Cannot be used in Combat.

abilities.name: Just a Scratch
abilities.text: Prevent all [Damage] you are about to take from one source.

abilities.name: Survivor
abilities.text: Use during the Rest Phase to Restore all your Exhausted Talents and Heal all your Drained Talents. You may only use this Ability once per Adventure.

abilities.name: Flesh Wound
abilities.text: Reduce the [Damage] you take from a [TradeBlows] result by +1[Damage]

abilities.name: Reactive throw
abilities.text: Remove Disadvantage on your next Ranged Attack this combat.

abilities.name: Driving Throw
abilities.text: If your Ranged Attack result is a [Strike] or [Critical], then increase its [Damage] by 1.

abilities.name: Using Reach
abilities.text: Remove Disadvantage and gain Advantage on your next attack this Combat. If your result is a [Fail] or [TradeBlows], then increase the [Damage] received by +1 [Damage].

abilities.name: Parry and Trip
abilities.text: Change your [PushedBack] result into an [Advance].

abilities.name: Push Forward
abilities.text: Use if you get a [TradeBlows] or [Strike] result to give the next Hero Advantage for their next attack this Combat.

abilities.name: Powerful Lunge
abilities.text: Gain Advantage for your next attack this Combat. Your next attack inflicts +1 [Damage] on a [TradeBlows], [Strike] or [Critical] result.

abilities.name: Step and Strike
abilities.text: Reduce the [Damage] you receive from a [TradeBlows] result by 1.

abilities.name: Back on Track
abilities.text: Remove Disadvantage from your next attack this Combat.

abilities.name: Winding Strike
abilities.text: Change a [TradeBlows] result into a [Strike]. The next Hero gains [Disadvantage] for their next attack this Combat.

abilities.name: Wind and Throw
abilities.text: Increase the damage from your [TradeBlows] result by 1.

abilities.name: Driving Strike
abilities.text: Only usable if you get a [Strike] or [Critical] result. Immediately make an additional Melee Attack this Round after this attack.

abilities.name: Shattering Blow
abilities.text: If your next attack this Combat results in a [Strike] or [Critical], then increase the damage of that attack by +1 [Damage].

abilities.name: Opening Volley
abilities.text: Only usable in the Engagement Round. You may make an additional Ranged Attack with your Bow this round.

abilities.name: Instinctive Shot
abilities.text: Remove Disadvantage on your next attack this Combat.

abilities.name: Speed Shooting
abilities.text: You may make 2 additional Ranged Attacks with your Bow. You have Disadvantage on all of your attacks this Round.

abilities.name: Followup
abilities.text: Play immediately after your Ranged Attack to make another Ranged Attack with your Bow.

abilities.name: Aimed Shot
abilities.text: Gain Advantage on your next attack this Combat.

abilities.name: Wandsplitter
abilities.text: If your next attack is a [Strike] or [Critical] result, then increase the damage of that attack by +1 [Damage].

abilities.name: Charge
abilities.text: Gain Advantage on your next attack this Combat.

abilities.name: Mighty Throw
abilities.text: Use as your Ranged Attack. Perform a Ranged Attack with the Axe, gaining +1 [Damage] on a [Strike] or [Critical]. The Axe cannot be used again until the end of the Combat.

abilities.name: Flurry
abilities.text: Change your [TradeBlows] result into an [Advance] result.

abilities.name: Timed Strike
abilities.text: If your next attack this Combat results in a [Strike] or [Critical], deals +1 [Damage].

abilities.name: Reckless
abilities.text: Ignore [PushedBack] or [Advance] results from your next attack this Combat.

abilities.name: Cleave
abilities.text: Change your [TradeBlows] or [Advance] result into a [Strike].

abilities.name: Lock Swords
abilities.text: Reduce the [Damage] received from a [TradeBlows] result to both the Hero and the Creature by 1.

abilities.name: Backstab
abilities.text: Use ony if you have Advantage. If your next attack this Combat results in a [Strike] or [Critical], deal +1 [Damage].

abilities.name: Committed
abilities.text: You may make an additional Melee Attack this Round.

abilities.name: Feint and Strike
abilities.text: If your next attack this Combat results in a [Strike] or [Critical], deal 1 extra [Damage]. If you get a [Fail] increase the [Damage] you take by 1.

abilities.name: Grapple
abilities.text: Change your [TradeBlows] result into an [Advance].

abilities.name: Strong Parry
abilities.text: Reduce the [Damage] you received from a [TradeBlows] result by 1.

abilities.name: Power Shot
abilities.text: Increase the damage of your attack by +1 [Damage].

abilities.name: Bombard
abilities.text: You may make two additional Ranged Attacks this Round with the Sling.

abilities.name: Charging Throw
abilities.text: If the result of your Ranged Attack is [Advance], [Strike], or [Critical] then you become a Melee Hero and may also make a Melee Attack during the Melee Phase of the Combat Round.

abilities.name: Fend Off
abilities.text: Play to turn your [TradeBlows] into an [Advance] result.

abilities.name: Reverse Strike
abilities.text: Remove Disadvantage from your next attack this Combat.

abilities.name: Assist
abilities.text: Play if another Hero's Melee Attack result is a [TradeBlows] to make it into a [Strike]. You gain Disadvantage for your next attack this Combat.

abilities.name: Draw Them Out
abilities.text: Gain Disadvantage on your next attack this Combat. Grant Advantage and +1 [Damage] to the next Hero to attack this combat.

abilities.name: Push Forward
abilities.text: Play after your [TradeBlows] result to grant the next Hero Advantage.

abilities.name: Haft Punch
abilities.text: Play after your [TradeBlows] result to attack again.

abilities.name: Overbear
abilities.text: Turn your [TradeBlows] result into an [Advance].

abilities.name: Bloodlust
abilities.text: Increase the bonus from Advantage tp +4. If your attack result is a [Fail] then turn it into a [Miss]

abilities.name: Take the Pain
abilities.text: Play after your [Miss] or [Fail] result to make an additional Melee Attack this Round.

abilities.name: Over-Reach
abilities.text: Turn your [TradeBlows] result into a [Strike]. The next Hero gains Disadvantage for their next attack in this Combat.

abilities.name: All Out Attack
abilities.text: You may continue to make Melee Attacks this round until you gain a [Fail] or [Miss] result.

abilities.name: Reactive Shot
abilities.text: Play in the Engagement Round only. Remove Disadvantage from your attack. Creature Ranged Attacks against you lose Advantage if they had it this round.

abilities.name: Pinning Fire
abilities.text: Play after you gain an [Advance] result to attack again with the Advantage from the [Advance] result.

abilities.name: Covered Retreat
abilities.text: Use your Ranged Attack to retreat immediately to the previous Location for no Time cost.

abilities.name: Deadeye
abilities.text: Ignore the negative Ranged modifier for a Foe for your next attack this Combat.

abilities.name: Dive for Cover
abilities.text: Play to force a Ranged Attack against you to be rerolled.

abilities.name: Covering Fire
abilities.text: Use as your Ranged Attack that deals no damage to grant all Melee Heroes Advantage this Combat Round.

abilities.name: Keep Away
abilities.text: Remove Disadvantage from the next Hero to attack this Combat.

abilities.name: Hold them Off
abilities.text: Play instead of your Melee Attack this Round to reduce the number of Creatures that can make Ranged Attacks by 2.

abilities.name: Grounding
abilities.text: Ignore your [Fail] or [Miss] result. Exhaust the Weapon until the end of the Combat.

abilities.name: Strike Around
abilities.text: Play after your [TradeBlows] result to make an additional Melee Attack this Round.

abilities.name: Quick Thrust
abilities.text: Change your [Advance] result into a [Strike]. The next Hero gains Disadvantage on their attack this Combat.

abilities.name: Slap Down
abilities.text: Change your [TradeBlows] result into a [Critical] result.

abilities.name: Take the Hit
abilities.text: Change your [Fail] result into a [TradeBlows] result.

abilities.name: Stop & Counter
abilities.text: On your [Fail] or [TradeBlows] result, play to immediately reroll the result.

abilities.name: Push Through
abilities.text: If you rolled an [Advance] result then you may immediately attack again with the Advantage gained from the Advance result.

abilities.name: Beat Down
abilities.text: Turn your [Advance] result into a [Critical] result.

abilities.name: Overhead Hook
abilities.text: Change your [Strike] result into a [Critical] result.

abilities.name: Overhead Cleave
abilities.text: Increase the damagae inflicted by your attack by +1 [Damage] for a [Strike] or [Critical] result. Treat a [Fail] result as a [Miss] result.

abilities.name: Aimed Throw
abilities.text: Gain Advantage on your next attack this Combat.

abilities.name: Salvo
abilities.text: If you roll an [Advance] or [Strike] result then you may make an additional Ranged Attack this Round.

abilities.name: Rain of Blows
abilities.text: Play after your [Strike] or [Critical] result to make an additional Melee Attack.

abilities.name: Mighty Blow
abilities.text: Increase the damage of your attack by +1 [Damage] on a [TradeBlows], [Strike] or [Critical] result. Deal 1 [Damage] on a [Advance] result as well as gaining Advantage.Treat [PushedBack] as [Fail].

abilities.name: Breaker
abilities.text: Turn your [Strike] result in a [Critical] Result.

abilities.name: Drive Back
abilities.text: Play after an [Advance] result to attack again with the Advantage from the [Advance] result.

abilities.name: Turn Blow
abilities.text: Turn your [TradeBlows] result into an [Advance] result.

abilities.name: Hold Off
abilities.text: Play after a [PushedBack] result to cancel the Disadvantage for the next Hero's attack.

-1 to Creature Ranged Attacks.

upgraded.text:

upgraded.name: Climbing Kit

Gain +1 to your Climb (Brawn) Tests.

basic.name: Herbalism Pack
basic.text:
You may choose 1 Potion at the start of each Adventure and use it for that Adventure.

During the Rest Phase, if there is [Fungi] in the Location, you may draw 1 Herb card from the Resource deck.

upgraded.name: Alchemist Set
upgraded.text:
You may choose 2 Potions at the start of each Adventure and use them for that Adventure.

During the Rest Phase, if there is [Fungi] in the Location, you may draw 2 Herb cards from the Resource deck.

abilities.name: Study Habitat
abilities.text: Gain +2 to your current Test in this Location. This may be used in Combat.

abilities.name: Fly Swarm
abilities.text: Gain Advantage against all Ranged Attacks against you until the end of the Combat.

abilities.name: Gather Glowbugs
abilities.text: Create [Light] until you choose to Restore this Talent in a Rest Phase. You do not need to Restore this Talent during the Rest Phase.

abilities.name: Druiach Lore
abilities.text: Gain +1 to your current Test for a card with the [Insect],[Animal] or [Reptile] modifier on it.

abilities.name: Gather Nature
abilities.text: Add an [Insect], [Animal] or [Reptile] counter to this card if it is present in the current Location. You may add this counter to any Location that you are in. Do not Restore this Talent while it has a counter on it, and discard the counter if this Talent is Drained.

abilities.name: Nature's Blessing
abilities.text: Heal a Hero for [Health] for each [AnimalKen] you have. This Talent may only be Healed by Camping.

abilities.name: Frog's Legs
abilities.text: Gain +1 to your Brawn or Grace for your current Test, or +2 if it is a Swim (Brawn) or Leap (Grace) Test.

abilities.name: Reptile Regen
abilities.text: Heal yourself for [Damage].

abilities.name: Serpent's Coils
abilities.text: Gain +1 to your Grace or Brawn for your current Test, or +2 if it is a Move (Grace) or Climb (Brawn) Test.

abilities.name: Cat's Senses
abilities.text: Gain +1 to your Reason or Grace for your current Test, or +2 if it is a Spot (Reason) or Balance (Grace) Test.

abilities.name: Alpha Rage
abilities.text: Gain Advantage and increase the [Damage] of your attack during the current Combat round by +1 [Damage].

abilities.name: Ape's Strength
abilities.text: Gain +1 to your Brawn or Grace for your current Test, or +2 if it is a Brute (Brawn) or Throw (Grace) Test.

abilities.name: Identify Dosage
abilities.text: When any Hero is using a Herb item, you may let them re-roll a failed Test when using the Herb item.

abilities.name: Brew Draft
abilities.text: Heal a Hero for [Damage] for each [Herbology] you have. This Ability cannot be used in Combat.

abilities.name: Fungi Ken
abilities.text: Remove the [Poison] Condition from a number of Heroes equal to the number of [Herbology] you have. This may be used in Combat as a Ranged Attack. This Ability is not affected by the [Poison] Condition.
